title: Glass Salt And Pepper Shaker Set, Spice Storage For Table Serving And Cooking With Dual Perforated Shaking Top - 3 Oz Spice Seasoning Shaker - 2 Pack
features: VERSATILE PLASTIC LID: the plastic lid has two openings, one perforated and one open. Simply twist the lid using the grip to line up the desired level of pour that you require.
REUSABLE AND REFILLABLE: Incredibly versatile, these little jars can be used time and time again. Safe to wash in the dishwasher, they are an ideal solution for you to use, store and refill.
EASY STORAGE SOLUTION: Their small size makes them a perfect kitchen tabletop, cooking, picnics & camping salt and paper shaker, or to store herb and spice rack or the kitchen pantry.
KEEP YOUR FOOD FRESH: durable glass jar to keep your spices tasting and to stay fresher for longer. With a plastic lid so they won’t rust.

HERB AND SPICE JAR: The mini, glass jar container measures 2 x 2 x 3-inches, with a capacity of 3oz – the shaker is made from glass the lid is made of BPA free plastic - color very Black, blue, or red.
description: Set of 2 shaker, you will receive either 2 Blue, 2 red or 2 black   Lock in that fresh flavor and revel in this simple storage solution!  Keeping your kitchen looking sleek and modern will prove simple with our range of 3oz containers for all your herbs, spices, and seasonings! With a dual flip-lid, you can choose to sift through the perforated opening, or pour larger quantities with the open side.   Our mini, glass jars are a durable solution to your storage needs and are available with gray, blue, or red plastic lids. The rounded edges offer a unique appearance, and the 2 x 2 x 3-inch measurements will enable you to store a variety of your favorite additions to mealtimes. Purchasing in bulk? The 3oz (80ml) capacity gives you the opportunity to keep small quantities of a variety of flavors to accompany those more complex recipes.   Each component of the jar is dishwasher safe, including the BPA free plastic lid, enabling you to clean with ease and reuse your glass jar as often as you wish!
